page.title: University of Montana College of Forestry and Conservation

revisions.rev:
{{Infobox_University |image_name = University of Montana Forestry.jpg |image_size = 155px |name = [[University of Montana]]
College of
Forestry and Conservation |established = 1913 |type = [[public university|Public]] |dean = Irma S. Russell |city = [[Missoula]] |state = [[Montana]] |country = [[United States|USA]] |students = |undergrad = |postgrad = |faculty = |staff = |campus = [[University of Montana]] |website = http://www.cfc.umt.edu/ |logo = |footnotes = }} ==History== The School of Forestry was created by an act of the Thirteenth Montanan Legislative Assembly in 1913 to meet the great and growing demand on the part of lumber companies, large timber holding corporations, and the national and state governments.Twentieth Register of the University of Montana 1914-1915. p.193 ==Laboratories and Stations== The College of Forestry and Conservation has access to well-equipped laboratories, extensive computer technology, and four field stations -- # the {{convert|28000|acre|km2|adj=on}} Lubrecht Experimental Forest # the [[Flathead Lake]] Biological Station on the shores of {{convert|184|sqmi|km2|adj=on}} Flathead Lake # the {{convert|3500|acre|km2|adj=on}} Bandy Ranch # the [[Boone and Crocket Club]]'s [[Theodore Roosevelt]] Memorial Ranch of {{convert|6000|acre|km2}} along the east face of the [[Rocky Mountains | Rockies]]. ==Program== The College of Forestry and Conservation was ranked third in the country behind [[Yale University]] and [[University of Washington | the University of Washington]] by the [[Faculty Scholarly Productivity Index]] in 2007[http://www.umt.edu/urelations/vision/2007/3quick-looks.htm Vision Magazine 2007]. ==Building== The [[Buildings at the University of Montana#Forestry Building | Forestry Building]] is one of the oldest buildings on campus. It was built in the Renaissance Revival style specified by Carsley-Gilbertâs master plan in 1922. ==External links== {{Reflist}} {{University of Montana}} {{coord missing|Montana}} [[Category:Schools and colleges of the University of Montana]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 1913]] [[Category:Forestry education]]
